txt.en: The view is fantastic, but you can see there is much yet to do
With the ropes strung you can now make your way to the peak of the colossus and survey all of Evendim.

'Thanks to some kindly aid from yourself, the ropes have been strung, and we are able to reach new places on the colossus in need of repair. But that is a task we can handle ourselves.

'For you, a treat... a vision I doubt like any you have seen before. Use the rope behind me and ascend to the peak of the colossus.

'Once you are up there make sure to <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> around and enjoy the view.'
The rope to climb the colossus is nearby.\n\nMake your way to the top of the colossus and have a <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb>.
'The beauty of the lake is enchanting. Yet I saw the same you did: the ruins to the west and north are in desperate need of our aid.'
Sardan is at the base of the colossus.\n\nSardan will be interested to hear what you have seen.
'You will have to go up there and see the view for yourself. I do not have words to describe it.'
Climb the peak of the colossus
Talk to Sardan near the colossus
